author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-1999 fixed the issue of camel-itest - contains multiple slf4j

author: markt
msg: Any test that uses latch.getPair() to determine if an object has been allocated, should also check latch.mayCreate()
This corrects two possible failure modes:
- threads waiting indefinitely for objects regardless of whether or not an object is available
- leaks in the internal processing count that could lead to pool exhaustion

author: ningjiang
msg: CAMEL-1998 update the features.xml for camel-jpa
